Name: Botanic Growth Powder
Description: A culinary byproduct primarily used for crafting fish bait.
Description$english: A culinary byproduct primarily used for crafting fish bait.
Description2$english: Made by simmering tender plant stems and buds, then sun-drying and grinding them into a fine powder—highly attractive to fish and perfect for bait-making!

recipes.Name: Botanic Growth Powder
recipes.Des: Made by simmering tender plant stems and buds, then sun-drying and grinding them into a fine powder—highly attractive to fish and perfect for bait-making!
recipes.Des$english: Made by simmering tender plant stems and buds, then sun-drying and grinding them into a fine powder—highly attractive to fish and perfect for bait-making!

NeedMaterial.Name: Tender Plant Stems
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Buds
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: In their free-living state, buds exhibit no discernible metabolic activity and exist in a dormant phase characterized as cryptobiosis. Upon encountering favorable environmental conditions, they resume activity and germinate into vegetative cells.
